name: Susanoo
skill: Deals 2080/2480 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a low chance of inflicting Stun.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a hero from Japanese mythology. Yamata-no-Orochi revived once again, cursed him to look like a small girl, and he can only use his powers if he acts like one, too. However, it is hard for him to accept that he's no longer a man. When he behaves like a girl his power is formidable, but if he doesn't keep it up, his powers fade fast. He's also starting to be concerned his wife is falling for a little girl...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Get a First half or Second half ranking of 1500 and above.
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Get a Total ranking of 2000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦  Increase damage dealt by 25% while battling Yamata-no-Orochi during the "Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" event.

main: "Why..why did this have to happen to me?"
summon: "Just gotta keep my eyes on the prize...lifting the curse!"
limit_break: "Don't tell me I've gotten even cuter!"
